creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
The borders of the SVG tabs are not rendered correctly.

- Clients:
  - Windows XP, Firefox
  - Windows XP, Internet Explorer
- Servers:
  - Windows XP, Jetty,
  - lenya.zones.apache.org:9999

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: It looks good when client + server is Mac OS X (Jetty, Firefox).

creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 18822
Screenshot showing the incorrect tab borders

I changed the JX template so that it looks good on Windows. Has to be reviewed
on Unix. I guess it won't work with OS X anymore.
creator: andreas@apache.org
